item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

12/17/2012's location will be: Box 63
We will be in the upstairs bar......

Carl and Tom Carbone former owner and member of the Carbone’s Restaurant Group are sure to be seen behind the bar, in the kitchen and just about anywhere you look
The owners are very enthusiastic to have us come for a happy hour, and have given us happy hour drink specials as well as extending happy hour just for us...

• Box 63 hosts some free appetizers
• Discounted drink specials during the 2 hours: $4 select drafts, House Wine, Well & frozen drinks/ $2 retro cans.
and they have a happy hour menu you can see it here: http://www.box63.com/eat/happy-hours


Gail will host and can be reached at 203-824-9869.

Please RSVP for this event when able to give Carl a heads up.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

For more information about the Bar, please visit: http://www.box63.com/

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
